pages.text: Dual-Handed Crafting is one of the many ways Pedestals adds non-GUI interactions to the mod.$(br2)To perform a craft, you must have a specific item held in your mainhand, a specific item held in your offhand, and then you must perform the "use item / place block" action (default key-bind: right click) on a specific in-world block.$(br2)The in-world block is consumed in the process, while the mainhand and offhand items are optionally consumed, and the resulting item that is crafted is spawned in-world to be picked up by the player.$(br2)

If you flipped the items that were meant to be held in your mainhand and offhand (as shown above), you'll instead craft the Backwards Linking Tool -- don't worry, the section on Tool Swapping will explain how to use that to get the Linking Tool.$(br2)
